name: Spacedock Defender
description:
Use Firefox or Chrome for best experiense. Game may not work on Safari.

We are building a prototype warship in a remote sector of our system. Unfortunately, our enemies found out the location and won't let us complete the ship. They will send wave after wave to destroy our spacedock. Can you help us to protect it at all costs?

Controls: To play the game you only need left mouse button.
